text: I feel like...

they always end up being about poop.

when they actually poop,
they have a certain way that they wipe.
And then everyone who wipes that way
assumes that everyone else in the world wipes the same way that they do.
And they don't realize that there's a whole 'nother subset
of people out there with their own
wiping techniques.
When these two people clash,
it's very embarrassing and awkward.

I literally—
My wife looks at me like I'm a—
like I just shit in her plate of food or something,
it's so gross to her.

in my left hand.
And I put my right hand in my—

Wasn't a good clean.
Women,
women out there: do not wipe your ass from the front,
